metadata.title: CVE-2024-26677 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: rxrpc:Fix delayed ACKs to not set the reference serial number Fix theconstruction of delayed ACKs to not set the reference serial number as theycan't be used as an RTT reference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26677` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-229-generic - 4.15.0-229.241
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-229-generic - 4.15.0-229.241
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-229-lowlatency - 4.15.0-229.241
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
